footer.description: Discover your intelligence level with our scientific test and get accurate, personalized results in minutes.

hero.title: Discover your intelligence level in
hero.description: Scientific IQ test with accurate and personalized results. Over 100,000 people have already discovered their potential.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to discover your intelligence level
howItWorks.step1Desc: Complete 20 visual logic questions. You have 20 minutes to complete the test, take the time you need to think about each answer.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Just €0.50 to unlock your result. 100% secure payment processed by Stripe. Includes 2-day premium trial.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Access your exact IQ, detailed analysis and comparison charts. Share your results on social media.

features.title: Why IQmind?
features.subtitle: The most accurate and accessible way to know your IQ
features.validatedDesc: Our test is based on recognized psychometric principles and validated by intelligence experts.
features.usersDesc: Thousands of people trust us to discover their intellectual potential every day.
features.secureDesc: Your data is protected. Secure payment with SSL encryption and full GDPR compliance.
features.analysisDesc: You don't just get a number. Receive a complete report with analysis of your strengths and areas for improvement.
features.certificateDesc: Download your certificate and share your results on social media or with whoever you want.
features.instantDesc: Don't wait days. Get your complete result immediately after completing payment.

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of people satisfied with their results

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Simple, clear and no surprises
pricing.importantNotice: ⚠️ Important: By paying €0.50, a 2-day premium trial is automatically activated. After that, €19.99/month will be charged.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know
faq.a1: The test consists of 20 visual logic questions that assess your reasoning ability. You have 20 minutes to complete it. Once finished, you pay €0.50 to see your complete result.
faq.a2: You will receive your exact IQ score, a detailed analysis of your cognitive abilities, comparison charts and an official certificate that you can download and share.
faq.a3: When you pay €0.50 for your result, a 2-day premium trial is automatically activated. After that, if you don't cancel, it becomes a €19.99/month subscription with access to unlimited tests and advanced analysis.
faq.a4: Yes, you can cancel at any time during the 2-day trial period with no additional charges. You can also cancel the monthly subscription whenever you want.
faq.a5: Yes, our test is based on recognized psychometric principles and has been validated by intelligence assessment experts.
faq.a6: Absolutely. We use Stripe, one of the world's most secure payment processors, with SSL encryption and full GDPR compliance.

cta.title: Ready to discover your intelligence level?
cta.subtitle: Join over 100,000 people who already know their IQ
cta.details: You only pay €0.50 to see your result • Includes 2-day premium trial

cancel.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel.subtitle: We're sorry to see you go. Please complete the form to process your cancellation.
cancel.point1: You will lose access to all premium tests
cancel.point2: You won't be able to see advanced comparative analysis
cancel.point3: Your saved progress will be deleted after 30 days
cancel.point4: You can reactivate your subscription at any time
cancel.emailHelper: Use the same email you registered with on IQmind
cancel.reasonPlaceholder: Tell us why you're canceling. Your feedback helps us improve.
cancel.successMessage: We have received your cancellation request. We will process your request within 24 hours and send you a confirmation email.
cancel.successInfo: Important information: Your premium access will remain active until the end of your current billing period. No further charges will be made after that date.
cancel.helpTitle: Have questions? Want to pause your subscription instead of canceling?

notices.importantMessage: By paying €0.50, a 2-day premium trial period is automatically activated. Afterwards, €19.99/month will be charged.
notices.point1: The €0.50 payment gives you immediate access to your complete result
notices.point2: A 2-day premium trial is automatically activated (value €19.99/month)
notices.point3: You can cancel within 2 days to avoid the monthly charge
notices.point4: If you don't cancel, you will be charged €19.99/month for continued premium access
notices.guaranteeMessage: If you're not 100% satisfied, we'll refund your money.
notices.cancelNoticeMessage: Your premium access will remain active until the end of your current billing period. No further charges will be made after that date.
